remarks: Property deduction for polynomial degree.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Mar-2015.)
statement:
deg1propd.b1 $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` R ) ) $.
deg1propd.b2 $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` S ) ) $.
deg1propd.p $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. B /\ y e. B ) ) -> ( x ( +g ` R ) y ) = ( x ( +g ` S ) y ) ) $.
deg1propd $p |- ( ph -> ( deg1 ` R ) = ( deg1 ` S ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d R x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d ph x y $.
